title: T206 Lenox Joe Tinker SGC20 SOLD

posts.post_title: T206 Lenox Joe Tinker SGC20 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed McCollum
Affordable condition HoFer with a rare black Lenox card back. Asking $1,100. E-mail to buy or make offer. PayPal prefered. edmcollum@cox.net
